bibl.title: Charms of the Past: Engraved Gems. A Private Collection of Ancient, Medieval and Modern Intaglii and Camei.
bibl.note: Non vidimus. - Collection Wiegandt. 11 objets (bagues, etc.) portent des inscriptions magiques en caractères grecs. Provenance inconnue, Ier-VIIe siècles p.C.
WIEGANDT Herbert, Charms of the Past: Engraved Gems. A Private Collection of Ancient, Medieval and Modern Intaglii and Camei.
Marburg, Wiegandt, 1998, 8°, viii-131 pp., nombr. figg. ISBN 3-9806362-0.
